title: The Writer's Almanac for Tuesday, March 1, 2022
description: Today we celebrate the birth of two poets, Robert Lowell (1917) and Richard Wilbur (1921), both two-time winners of the Pulitzer Prize for Poetry.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today we celebrate the birth of two poets, Robert Lowell (1917) and Richard Wilbur (1921), both two-time winners of the Pulitzer Prize for Poetry.
